{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Disciple shot | class = WizardFX1 | game = Heretic | spawnid = 140 | spawnname = T_WIZARDSHOT }}[[Classes]]: WizardFX1
[[Classes:Wizard|Disciples of D'Sparil]] fire three of these purple projectiles at a time, in large spread. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR WizardFX1 { {{Property|Radius}} 10 {{Property|Height}} 6 {{Property|Speed}} 18 {{Property|FastSpeed}} 24 {{Property|Damage}} 3 {{Property|Projectile}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEIMPACT}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEPCROSS}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add States { Spawn: FX11 AB 6 Bright Loop Death: FX11 CDEFG 5 Bright Stop } }
